name: 9 Lives (iPengin, Silver5478, SpectreVIX, Lumille)
description:
# 9-Lives-GameDev.tv-Game-Jam-2022

10 days game jam for  GameDev.tv Game Jam 2022:

Backstory:

Metia the Cat has 9 lives. 

On one fateful night in Poipoi City, Metia the Cat decided to end his life by jumping off the edge of a building. After falling to his death, Metia seemed to have miraculously resurrected at the spot of his death. Metia who still wishes to die continues on to fulfill his wish of dying while a god tries to hinder him.

Will Metia's will to die eventually break? Or will the gods above continue to play with Metia's life?  

Only time will tell.

--------------------------------------------------

Gameplay:
You control Metia the Cat which will start with 8 lives having died once already. Try to help Metia find more DIFFERENT ways to die.

--------------------------------------------------

Notes:
If there are resolution/display Issues, 
Change the display scale and layout of your screen to 100%

--------------------------------------------------
